synopsis.text:
Youichirou Amano and Takeru Oosawa are more than just colleagues at the AI Robot Technology Research Lab in 2060 Tokyo, they're childhood friends. As the city prepares for its third Olympic Games, the pair find themselves entangled in a top-secret national project involving humanoid robots. Takeru, a dedicated operator, is entrusted with controlling T-004, a robot so lifelike it's nearly indistinguishable from a human.

As the project advances, Takeru finds himself caught in a love triangle with Saki, Youichirou's sister and Takeru's longtime crush, and T-004, who Saki believes to be a man named Tsubasa. Amidst the unfolding romantic drama, a chilling terrorism threat casts a dark shadow over the lab and the Olympics. With the stakes higher than ever, Takeru must navigate the complexities of love, friendship, and duty to protect both the city and the woman he loves. 

As the story unfolds, unexpected plot twists and emotional turns keep readers on the edge of their seats, culminating in a poignant and unforgettable conclusion. Will Takeru be able to balance his professional and personal responsibilities, or will the mounting pressure prove too much to handle? Only time will tell in this gripping tale of love, loyalty, and sacrifice.
